Reviews.Content: Ok resolution, good enough for surveying. Nice preset functions. Record mode only works with IE, or a ActiveX browser (which is IE).

Reviews.Title: EASY IP CAM
Reviews.Author: Tony Rhoades
Reviews.Content: I would advise anyone buying this to read the customer reviews, first the software for the camera is useless, never been able to get this camera to record via the software, the instructions would make a good bird cage liner.... I would consider myself a 75% tech user, many years of exp in the pc business, and this was a 3 day task for me. It works great right out of the box if you are only going to use it INSIDE your home network, 10 minutes for that. if you buy this for remote viewing via the internet you better plan on hiring a professional to configure your network and save your sanity....It took me 3 days to get everything running including wireless, the picture is great, even in the dark. if you intention is to be able to monitor your home or office remotely do your homework with regards to your home or office network router, you must provide port forwarding to accomplish this from the internet side. I bought it just for the purpose of being able to monitor from anywhere on the internet.in closing the cam works as described, once you get the software to work, don't plan on any tech support, i did download the app for my phone right from the link they supplied and installed it only to see that it was written in CHINESE!!

Reviews.Title: IP Cam
Reviews.Author: Dude
Reviews.Content: Great product! Very easy to set up and use. The mobile app from the website is difficult no install and function, but if you have a smart phone there is a great app on the market called IP Cam Viewer that works just like using your computer. This is amazing camera for the value. The picture quality is fantastic, even in the dark. The only draw back is the speaker on the camera for 2 way communication is next to the microphone so you receive terrible feedback, however this can be simply fixed by plugging in an external speaker to the port on the back of the camera. All in all, I would definitely purchase this again.

Reviews.Title: havent really used it but hooked it up and used the android app but not sure how to hear the feed
Reviews.Author: pavlo
Reviews.Content: havent really used it but hooked it up and used the android app but not sure how to hear the feed

Reviews.Title: poor instructions
Reviews.Author: Adam
Reviews.Content: I didn't expect a plug and play instal but setting up this camera is ridiculous. The instructions are awful. Haven't been able to get it to work wireless either.

Reviews.Title: terrrible instructions
Reviews.Author: Anthony G
Reviews.Content: I now have a $60 paper weight, I can't figure out how to set this thing up for the life of me.

Reviews.Title: Easy--Not So Much
Reviews.Author: B. H. Adams "bhadams1"
Reviews.Content: I'm a COMPTIA certified and IT helpdesk professional and specialist, and I can't get this to work properly.The instructions is written and translated from Chinese and the software is not user-friendly.  I would have been better off in just buying a security camera system or and iPhone baby monitor system.

Reviews.Title: Did not receive advertised product.
Reviews.Author: Cathy A. Wison
Reviews.Content: The camera I received is different than the pictures. Its missing the alarm block and appears to be much larger. Also the pan/tilt does not work on the Android phone.

Reviews.Title: WORKS ONLY IN LOCAL NETWORK
Reviews.Author: MDMD
Reviews.Content: Works only inside a local network. Does not work from Internet = from another remote site/ Internet. Alarm, Motion detection never works. Good if one is going to use inside a network. Instructions/ Manual very lousy, in Chinese or Poor English. Amazon should review and make product work (by its staff ) before selling. I am returning it, hopefully will buy similar American product, at least documented with normal English.Inside a network, it does work well, good picture, can move camera up/down/left/right, but Alarm and Motion Detection will not work.Did do lot of research and studying to make it work, learned a lot including port Forwarding etc.

Reviews.Title: Spend a little more and get one that actually works properly
Reviews.Author: mjs
Reviews.Content: I got this camera after seeing a number of good reviews for being a cheap camera. But this camera does not work properly. The sound seemed to work when I first got the camera, but does nothing now, maybe because I'm at a different computer with IE9, but I cannot get it to work at all. So I am suspecting it may work with older browsers only which does no good. The video quality is very poor and forget about color, they are completely off due to the IR. The video performance is also very choppy. Sometimes pan and tilt work, other times it doesn't. This camera can also be buggy at times. The motion alarm is iffy, sometimes it works, other times it don't. It wont let you cycle through the presets like its supposed to. The record function does not work. The webpage that you get to view the camera is rather ugly. P2P mode is always tiring to connect. Setup is a real pain in the butt. Sometimes it doesn't even setup properly and you have to fight with it. Forget about updating it. I heard that tech support actually has to do it for you. The only DNS server you can use with it is theirs which is at ipcam.hk. And that's assigned to you which mine did not correlate with the box. Also it does not work completely with its own software. 3rd party software is spotty.Spend a little more money to get a better one, because this one sucks. Otherwords be prepared for allot of headaches.

Reviews.Title: Difficult network setup
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: After spending considerable time attempting to get this camera setup to use as a web accessible camera I returned it without ever getting it setup.

Reviews.Title: Not what I had hoped for.
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: The camera is actually a nice camera, such as clarity.  BUT, it ONLY works if it is wired.  The ability to use as a wireless camera via Droid is impossible.  I spent over 5 hours trying to get this to work....I tried contacting the company but the phone number given is out of service. I even bought a new router thinking I had to update my equipment.  Very disapointing. A waste of my time and Amazons.

Reviews.Title: Hard to control and laggy images
Reviews.Author: Osiris
Reviews.Content: I spent a lot of time setting up this camera and it is really not worth the money.  This is definitively not for someone that doesn't know how to work with router settings.  The camera images are very slow to update when viewing it from the computer.  When someone walks across the room there is a large delay in seeing it happen.  It constantly seems to want to reset itself so that it looks at the ceiling.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: goneplumcrazy
Reviews.Content: I'm labeling this as a good but not great camera.  I found it easy to setup because I had a dlink ip camera & knew already how to set this up.  I want a camera that was day & night and also panned & tilted. Which this one does. Awesome but I found that the colors was off.  Thing that sound be dark blue was purple, things that was burgandy would be pink, black would look sort of white and so forth.  Night time display was great.  You can set the ptz to whatever setting you would like ( And thanks to the customer who said how to turn off the blinking green light - that was annoying tryin to sleep with it on) there is no way to force day or night mode like on my dlink. Customer service was no help in trying to fix the color problem.  Their response was "color cast is caused by IR light" but I have plenty of light in the room and have tried the brightness & contrast setting - they dont fix it either.  If another customer who know how to fix it or even has the same problem, please post it.  I am one who would definitely like to know.  Would I buy another 1, maybe if the color problem gets fixed.

Reviews.Title: Coulda been
Reviews.Author: Barry A. Bodhaine
Reviews.Content: This could have been a nice little project. Unfortunately it is the worst set of instructions I have ever encountered. I finally got it working on a hard wire. Then I finally got it working on wi-fi. I never succeeded in getting it working over the internet. Also I never succeeded in getting any tech support from anybody. Basically EasyN does not supply any tech support. So I returned it for a full refund. This is an example of a really nice little product that has the potential to work great. They could sell millions of them if they could just get the installation to work for the average person. I would rate myself as medium tech; I can get most things working. But this was not one of them. Here's some advice for EasyN: Get your act together, this could have been a winner.

Reviews.Title: Easy N - Should be Easy Not- Will not work.Will Never WorkX2
Reviews.Author: Mike J. Cianciosi "Mike"

Reviews.Title: Hard to install and use !
Reviews.Author: dhale
Reviews.Content: Not easy at all to set up and install to the computer. Directions for this product are not at all easy !! I would not recommend to anybody. But still gona try to figure this out!!!

Reviews.Title: Would NOT Work for me............
Reviews.Author: AV
Reviews.Content: I really wanted this thing to work.  But, the software would not work.  The "Find Device" software could not find this device. Without this info you cannot link the device to your network.  I tried a different program to search for it and it was there but I was not able to manually input the network setting listed by the second program.  The web address listed on the box also did not produce any help or support.  Perhaps my unit was defective or the software was bad but I believe that the next guy will have the same problems. Something was wrong with this thing and there was no option but to return it to Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Blank Software CD and Over 1 Hr Download from Website!!!
Reviews.Author: GmaCam
Reviews.Content: Requested the seller contact me about the fact that I purchased 2 of these cameras and both cds they sent are BLANK! My computer tells me the disc needs to be reformatted to be used and when I try to look at the files, it tells me there aren't any...the whole disc is blank. The instructions suck, but there are a few decent videos on youtube, IF you actually have the software. After waiting 48 minutes, I got a download error "You cannot download this software because the source file does not exist." Once I actually get the software, either by download or having the seller send me something that actually has some info on it, I might be able to use this thing.From looking at the videos though, I am not happy with the actual viewing window size. I guess we'll see...If I don't get a response soon, I'll be sending both back.[...] (1 hr software download with errors)[...] (decent tutorial video once you actually have the program)

Reviews.Title: Camera Defective
Reviews.Author: terry mullane
Reviews.Content: The image quality of the camera was very poor . I have similar cameras which work very well . However ,  I was pleased with all other aspects of the purchase from Amazon , the timeliness of delivery , and the excellent return procedures for the camera .I have since purchased another camera from Amazon which I am waiting to receive .

Reviews.Title: No wireless set up
Reviews.Author: Tuan A. Nguyen
Reviews.Content: No set up manual clear for the customer. NO set up for wireless, no  tech support for this merchandise, No recommend

Reviews.Title: just wifi
Reviews.Author: javier
Reviews.Content: its ok for the price. I set it up to watch it over wifi but I havent figure out how to watch it over the internet.

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: John L. Honeck Jr. "1968Dart"
Reviews.Content: Won't connect to anything, the "search" software cannot find it connected direction or on three different routers I tried. Whoever wrote the manual should be fired.

Reviews.Title: returned
Reviews.Author: Michael D. Peterson
Reviews.Content: This camera was so easy to set up with the iphone app.  Took me about 30 sec to get it working.  Move around the camera with the iphone and night vision was so amazing.  The computer software was impossible to figure out.  Twhere were some amazing reviews explaining in detail so to set it up and youtube videos showing how to set it up.  Nothing worked.  I couldn't get the software to install.  Nothing would download.  Could not get the wireless to work.  The company website is terrible.  If you want a camera to use for live feed with you iphone works great but to use it to record or anything else no way would I recommend this.  I returned this and got a dlink camera and I love my new camera.  Had it up and running in less then 15 min.

Reviews.Title: EasyN Camera
Reviews.Author: Dennis "Dennis"
Reviews.Content: It came on time and I started to install it but it wouldn't work after hours of trying. I found out it will not work on windows 8.1 os. The camera looked good and I wanted the pan/tilt part to work. If I would have read all the comments on this camera I wouldn't have ordered it in the first place. I had better luck installing  the D-Link cloud camera 1150 right out of the box and works wonderful but doesn't have the pan/tilt that I wanted. I'm  lucky I only wasted $30.00 on this for it could have cost me a lot more and wouldn't be able to use it. The time and cost to return its worth it unless its all free.  It wanted me to change my router setup and then told me that if I did I may not be able to use the other items install on it. WHY????? Also the Add never said anything about it not working on windows 8.l. after reading some of the info on it which wasn't any good I see windows xp. but nothing about upgrading to windows 8.1.  I would tell everyone to READ ALL THE COMMENTS ABOUT THIS BEFORE ORDING IT.

Reviews.Title: Had to by additional adapter
Reviews.Author: harold mitchem
Reviews.Content: The camera arrived as promised but when i opened the box the powers cable was for use in Europe not the U.S.! after speaking with customer service i still HAD to buy a adapter plug, still cant use it!  NOT HAPPY!!

Reviews.Title: Web interface crashes after 1 use
Reviews.Author: Rodney
Reviews.Content: Login and view the web interface.  Video works, but no audio (used IE and installed ActiveX).Closed browser (or tried another separate device) and the web interface never came up.  No prompt to login nor device viewing mode selection screen.I had to unplug and plug back in to reboot each time after first use.Also the microphone and speaker didn't appear to work.  Tried multiple client devices (IE browser, Android phone) with no success.

Reviews.Title: I wouldn't buy again
Reviews.Author: Kurt Reineman "Kurt R"
Reviews.Content: Cannot get sound to work for the life of me. Has pretty good picture wireless however. Setup was ok. If you get it at a exceptional price, it might be ok.

Reviews.Title: too much work
Reviews.Author: april seivard
Reviews.Content: we are returning these because they are too difficult to  install.  We couldn't understand how to hook them up to the wireless internet.

Reviews.Title: Not bad for the price.  Able to setup within 1 hour, but...
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: I work with computers and I read other reviews that had detailed instructions.  If you had to rely on the documentation that came with the camera it would take much longer.  I was up and running pretty quick.  There is also a site out there for EasyN cameras that has a link to different router port forwarding instructions.  I am at work looking through the camera on my iPhone.  Works great.  On the iPhone it is definitely worth the price to get the UCamPro vs. the EasyN camera app.  The UCamPro seems to support all of the camera functions and a few others.  Very clear picture and the pan/tilt controls work great.  For the price, I think this is a bargain.  If you can get through the setup it works well.  As far as the missing zoom, the iPhone app allows digital zoom and at the highest resolution it works fine just by pinching and spreading.Suggestions:Read through some of the reviews that have step-by-step instructions.  If you don't know how to setup port forwarding on your router do an Internet search.  Be patient.  One time it just wouldn't connect during all of the setup after a reboot.  Removing power and plugging it back in allowed it to reconnect.  After that I have not had any problems.One thing that may make me exchange it is when I plug the camera in it throws a fairly big spark.  May send it back for another of the same.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: John E Boy
Reviews.Content: The camera is great; the pan/tilt, light, motion sensor... all of it works really well. no complaints with any of the basic functions. The Audio / Microphone is terrible. I placed the camera in 2 indoor locations, and 2 outdoor locations with the same noise level problems. I have not tested the speaker yet. Audio and Microphone were not deal breakers for me.The software cd it ships with is useless. If you're going to rely on the software cd then you are going to have problems getting the camera configured and working on your network. It's a night and day difference configuring it manually versus using the software it ships with.I was only able to test the Android client, and it also was a bag of failure. I would suggest using a 3rd party software, "IP Cam Viewer" works really well!The remote management of the camera was also simple enough; I use linux, and chrome -- no problems configuring or accessing. Again -- the native software failed to install properly on my Windows systems, and I wanted a manual configuration anyways.I have no problems accessing via wired, or wifi (tested all the security protocols) after reboots. I simulated a power outage without any issues when I restored power (settings retained, etc.)In summary, the easiest method I found:1) place camera on the wired segment of your LAN (plug a cat 5/6 cable into your camera, power it on)2) log in to your router, see what systems _just_ pulled a new dhcp address (i think the default hostname is IPCAM)3) put the IP in your browser, log in using the default credentials (something actually listed in the manual)4) configure...

Reviews.Title: Happy with the Camera
Reviews.Author: Christopher Sipos "Jo Mama"
Reviews.Content: Don't try and set=up yourself, unless you are a Guru.  This Youtube video tells you how.  Title: (How to set up an ip camera), this one uses the Easyn camera.  It was a lot easier to do following them.  I am close, but not done all features completely, still need to go back and tweek to get access over internet and through cellphone.  P.S., if you hooked yours up and got the settings all crazy like I did, you can push and hold the reset button on the bottom of the camera to undo whatever you did.  Good Luck.

Reviews.Title: happy to buy easyn
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: i learned that easyn is a famous brand in China, and try to get a one to monitor my baby. the picture is very clear, it is easy to setup.  my best purchasing on amazon. thank aikbell.

Reviews.Title: I have never been mor dissatisfied
Reviews.Author: Billy
Reviews.Content: I have not had this much problem with anything I can not get it hooked up I tryed to get support all I get is chinese instructions the english instructions aren't worth  a crap in the manual. I would not recommend this to anyone and I plan on sending mine back it isn't worth $2 let alone the $59 I spent

Reviews.Title: Couldn't Install
Reviews.Author: Amy C
Reviews.Content: We returned this camera.  We had purchased it to use as a video monitor for our baby, but it was too difficult to install.  The instructions were in Chinese.

Reviews.Title: DON'T EVEN WASTE YOUR TIME
Reviews.Author: Tru
Reviews.Content: DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME BUYING THIS THING. THIS THING HAS NO PROS, ASIDE FROM IT ARRIVING ON TIME.THIS IS A PIECE OF CRAP IP CAM, RESOLUTION IS A JOKE, SETTING IT UP WAS A COMPLETE NIGHTMARE YOU COULDN'T WAKE UP FROM AND THEN WHEN YOU SEE THE RESOLUTION IT'S LIKE WATCHING MOVIE ON A TV MADE FROM 1920. THIS IS A VERY EXPENSIVE PAPER WEIGHT. NOT WORTH THE PLASTIC IT'S MADE FROM....WHAT A JOKE FOR A IP CAMERA....CAN'T EVEN USE IT FOR A BABY MONITOR OR ANYTHING SIMPLE IT'S JUST NOT WORTH IT AT ALL....

Reviews.Title: If your internet goes down your cameras don't work
Reviews.Author: David A. Johnson
Reviews.Content: 5 foot power cord with a heavy plug end and not having a central management control software that works with any 64 bit operating system is ridiculous. The only way you can access the cameras is through the manufacturers server which takes up a lot of bandwidth and gives them access to the cameras. When your internet service goes down, your cameras go down!

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed....
Reviews.Author: M Didymus "mande"
Reviews.Content: ...with this product and I am about 95% certain that I will return it.  I didn't buy this product to be connected to my router via rj45 but by 802.11 standards.  This is the second day I have toyed with this camera to get wireless working and to no avail the umbilical cord is still connected.  It gives in my opinion a great picture and the spanning is nice; it really could be a great product BUT I want all of the functions I paid for operational and wireless does not work on this product.  And oh yeah...don't bother with tech support.  THEY WON'T ANSWER.

Reviews.Title: Great IP Cam
Reviews.Author: Maxx
Reviews.Content: Love my IP cam. I hade a bit of difficulty setting up the cam at first, thats because unfamiliar to Wifi network setup. Recommended for IR night and dark places looking for gost and orbs.

ProductInfo.Features:
Wi-Fi compliant with wireless standards IEEE 802.11b/g
Mobile view allow you remote viewing & record from anywhere anytime
Motion detection with external alarm output, e-mail photo, FTP photo, FTP record
Two-way audio monitoring (pan: 270 degrees & tilt: 90 degrees)
Auto IR-LED illumination for night vision up to 10 meters
ProductInfo.Name: EasyN FS-613B-M166 Wireless Pan/Tilt IP Camera with 2-Way Audio
